title: New Champion?

embed.description: Blue Flame Islands is an island archipelago off the southeastern coast of the Valoran mainland. The culture of Blue Flame Islands is deeply tied to Bilgewater, the island's nation. Bilgewater, over the years, has become an important stop for trade ships traveling near the Blue Flame Islands.

body: So I was reading league wiki instead of studying lol and it states that Bligewater was under attack by the black mist at some point but was halted by the combined efforts of miss forchune, gangplank, naut and a Leviathan. Could this leviathan be a new champion in the future? I reckon the idea is pretty awesome, the last champion to have ties with Bligewater was Illaoi, so maybe its time. Thoughts?

replies.body:
the Leviathan was related to Illaoi pretty sure.

Like thats the "god" she communes with (hence the tentacles)

oh yeee tru
maybe we'll see her god on the field then lol
Nah, the leviathan was the Krakenwyrm that Olaf fought in chapter two of "Shadow and Fortune"
should probs read more into the law then i suppose

I reckon the deity Illaoi got her powers from is this Leviathan, so...

Maybe, i don't know, but Illaoi's pretty OP so the Leviathan would be like Yasuo or somethin'

LOL bringing back dead items  http://pa1.narvii.com/5834/14f3bf576cf26612aa49e161c296b9d96f1550d4_hq.gif as champions or making the champions that made items so famous into the game, or as bosses on new game maps/modes o. o That'd be even more epic with op basic ms/collision size for even more unique builds/plays and refreshment to the game! T_T But with abilities that made them not op as well though to make them balanced x_x (e.g a tiny fairy that can get out of melee range  before you even turn to face it while your under the effects of a cc or a giant champion that almost blocks a jungle path/entrance.)  https://i.imgsafe.org/fdea6efe78.png I'm not being racist or any thing, I just like how his character in the tv show Zoo says 'Oh my god' as 'My got.' At least that's how I heard it the last time o.-??? That image isn't even from Zoo, I just couldn't find any images with him saying it. Got was just a juicy coincidence. I don't think were allowed to say the full title of got since it is got after all. That sounds fun to play...a champion who's like a vessel that can release the WHOLE kraken as an ultimate or plainly playing as a giant az monster!%$@#% O_O lol now I'm thinking about that show with "Sm and Dn."
